flawed_nl_solution:
He makes $.5 profit on each bracelet because 1.5 - 1 = <<1.5-1=0.5>>0.5
He earns $6 because 12 x 0.5 = <<12*0.5=6>>6
The cookies cost $4 because 6 - 3 = <<6-3=4>>4
